message.content:
cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.DB, cs.DC

This paper discusses the application of blockchain technology and smart contracts in business process re-engineering, which involves the redesign of existing processes for improved efficiency and effectiveness. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CY (Computers and Society), which deals with the social and ethical aspects of computing technologies. The paper also discusses security and privacy concerns related to blockchain, which makes cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) another likely category. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of databases and data management in blockchain-based solutions, which makes cs.DB (Databases) a possible category. The paper also discusses the use of distributed systems and networks, which makes cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) another possible category. Finally, the paper discusses the use of software engineering principles in the design of blockchain-based solutions, which makes cs.SE (Software Engineering) a possible category as well.
